This allows the system to be ",n(i.strong,{children:"scalable"})," as the number of users, products, and transactions grows significantly."]}),"
",a(i.p,{children:["All critical data‚Äîfrom user details and product catalogs to transaction records‚Äîis stored consistently in a database, making this platform a ",n(i.strong,{children:"reliable, secure, and production-ready"})," foundation for modern e-commerce applications."]}),"

title: Distributed Modular Monolith E-commerce Platform
excerpt: A Distributed Modular Monolith E-commerce Platform built with Go, gRPC, PostgreSQL, and Kafka with full observability stack.
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:a,jsxs:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return e(n,{children:[a(r.h1,{id:"-distributed-modular-monolith-ecommerce",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-distributed-modular-monolith-ecommerce",children:"‚ú® Distributed Modular Monolith Ecommerce"})}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Proyek ini adalah ",a(r.strong,{children:"implementasi backend untuk platform e-commerce"}),", yang dirancang menggunakan ",a(r.strong,{children:"Arsitektur Monolit Modular"}),". Arsitektur ini mengikuti model penerapan monolitik tetapi dengan pemisahan kepentingan yang jelas antara berbagai ",a(r.strong,{children:"domain bisnis"})," seperti Pengguna, Pedagang, Produk, Pesanan, Transaksi, dan Ulasan."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Dengan mengadopsi pendekatan monolit modular, sistem tetap ",a(r.strong,{children:"terstruktur, dapat dipelihara, dan konsisten"}),", sambil juga membuka pintu untuk ",a(r.strong,{children:"evolusi potensial menuju layanan mikro"})," di masa depan jika skalabilitas yang lebih tinggi diperlukan."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Komunikasi antar modul di dalam monolit ditangani secara internal melalui ",a(r.strong,{children:"panggilan fungsi langsung/batas domain"}),", sementara interaksi eksternal (seperti antara API Gateway dan server utama atau dengan cache/broker pesan) ditangani menggunakan ",a(r.strong,{children:"gRPC"})," dan ",a(r.strong,{children:"REST API"}),". Persistensi data dikelola melalui ",a(r.strong,{children:"PostgreSQL"})," sebagai basis data utama, dengan ",a(r.strong,{children:"Redis"})," untuk caching dan ",a(r.strong,{children:"Kafka"})," sebagai broker pesan berbasis peristiwa."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Selain fungsionalitas bisnis, proyek ini dilengkapi dengan ",a(r.strong,{children:"tumpukan observabilitas modern"})," (Prometheus, Loki, Grafana, Jaeger, OpenTelemetry), yang memungkinkan visibilitas penuh ke dalam metrik, log, dan jejak terdistribusi. Ini memastikan debugging yang lebih baik, pemantauan kinerja, dan keandalan operasional."]}),"
",a(r.hr,{}),"
",a(r.h3,{id:"-fitur-utama",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-fitur-utama",children:"üéØ Fitur Utama"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üîê Otentikasi & Manajemen Pengguna"}),"
Mendukung pendaftaran pengguna, login, token penyegaran, dan otorisasi berbasis peran menggunakan ",a(r.strong,{children:"JWT"}),"."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üè¨ Manajemen Pedagang"}),"
Pedagang dapat membuat dan mengelola toko mereka, termasuk detail bisnis, kebijakan, dokumen verifikasi, dan penghargaan."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üì¶ Manajemen Produk & Inventaris"}),"
CRUD penuh untuk produk dan kategori, termasuk pelacakan stok, penetapan harga, deskripsi, dan kategorisasi produk."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üõí Keranjang Belanja & Manajemen Pesanan"}),"
Pelanggan dapat menambahkan item ke keranjang mereka, melanjutkan ke checkout, dan menghasilkan pesanan resmi. Pesanan ditautkan dengan produk, item, dan pedagang."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üí≥ Pemrosesan Transaksi & Pembayaran"}),"
Sistem mencatat transaksi, menangani status pembayaran, dan dapat memicu acara konfirmasi untuk layanan lain (misalnya, pemberitahuan email)."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"‚≠ê Ulasan Produk"}),"
Pelanggan dapat mengirimkan ulasan dan peringkat setelah menyelesaikan pembelian, meningkatkan interaktivitas dan kepercayaan platform."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"üìß Integrasi Eksternal"}),"
Acara seperti konfirmasi pedagang, verifikasi akun, dan pembaruan transaksi dapat memicu ",a(r.strong,{children:"Layanan Email"})," untuk pemberitahuan."]}),"
"]}),"

",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Docker Compose"}),": Menyediakan lingkungan pengembangan lokal yang lengkap dengan mengatur layanan, basis data, dan alat observabilitas."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Kubernetes (K8s)"}),": Menyediakan penerapan yang siap produksi, dapat diskalakan, dan tangguh dengan Pod terpisah per layanan, ",a(r.strong,{children:"Horizontal Pod Autoscalers (HPA)"})," untuk penskalaan, dan observabilitas terintegrasi."]}),"
"]}),"

Diatur melalui ",a(r.code,{children:"docker-compose"}),", termasuk API Gateway (NGINX), layanan inti, Redis, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Layanan Email, dan tumpukan observabilitas. Ideal untuk penyiapan pengembangan lokal yang cepat dan konsisten."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["

Diterapkan di bawah namespace khusus (",a(r.code,{children:"ecommerce"}),"). Setiap layanan berjalan di Pod-nya sendiri dengan penskalaan otomatis opsional menggunakan ",a(r.strong,{children:"HPA"}),". Infrastruktur inti mencakup Kafka (dengan Zookeeper), Redis Cluster, dan PostgreSQL. Komponen observabilitas berjalan sebagai Pod/DaemonSet, memastikan log, metrik, dan jejak dikumpulkan dan divisualisasikan."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"

",a(r.h2,{id:"gambaran-arsitektur",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#gambaran-arsitektur",children:"Gambaran Arsitektur"})}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Platform ini dirancang menggunakan arsitektur ",a(r.strong,{children:"Monolit Modular Terdistribusi"}),". Gaya canggih ini memberikan keseimbangan unik, menawarkan pengembangan yang disederhanakan dan pengujian yang disederhanakan dari monolit sambil memungkinkan penskalaan dan penerapan independen dari sistem berbasis layanan mikro."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Aplikasi ini dibangun sebagai biner Go tunggal yang berisi semua modul logika bisnis. Saat runtime, beberapa instance biner ini diterapkan, dengan setiap instance dikonfigurasi untuk menjalankan modul tertentu (misalnya, ",a(r.code,{children:"auth"}),", ",a(r.code,{children:"product"}),", ",a(r.code,{children:"order"}),"), yang secara efektif berperilaku seperti layanan terpisah."]}),"
",a(r.p,{children:"Sistem ini dirancang untuk diterapkan menggunakan kontainerisasi, dengan kontainer terpisah untuk setiap layanan. Ini memungkinkan penskalaan dan manajemen komponen secara independen di lingkungan seperti produksi."}),"
",a(r.h3,{id:"konsep-arsitektur-utama",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#konsep-arsitektur-utama",children:"Konsep Arsitektur Utama:"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"API Gateway"}),": Titik masuk tunggal untuk semua permintaan klien. Ini merutekan lalu lintas ke layanan backend yang sesuai, menangani otentikasi, dan menyediakan API terpadu."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"gRPC untuk Komunikasi Antar-Layanan"}),": gRPC berkinerja tinggi digunakan untuk komunikasi antara layanan internal, memastikan latensi rendah dan kontrak bertipe kuat."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Pesan Asinkron dengan Kafka"}),": Kafka digunakan untuk komunikasi berbasis peristiwa, memisahkan layanan dan meningkatkan ketahanan. Misalnya, ketika kartu baru dibuat, sebuah pesan dipublikasikan ke topik Kafka, yang kemudian dikonsumsi oleh layanan ",a(r.code,{children:"email"})," untuk memperbarui saldo."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Observabilitas Terpusat"}),": Platform ini mengintegrasikan tumpukan observabilitas yang komprehensif:","
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Prometheus"})," untuk mengumpulkan metrik."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Jaeger"})," (melalui OpenTelemetry) untuk pelacakan terdistribusi."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Loki"})," dan ",a(r.strong,{children:"Promtail"})," untuk agregasi log."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Grafana"})," untuk visualisasi metrik, jejak, dan log."]}),"

",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Sinkron (gRPC)"}),": Komunikasi berkinerja tinggi dan latensi rendah antara API Gateway dan layanan internal dicapai menggunakan gRPC."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Asinkron (Kafka)"}),": Untuk memisahkan layanan dan menangani alur kerja berbasis peristiwa, platform menggunakan Kafka. Misalnya, ketika pesanan ditempatkan, acara ",a(r.code,{children:"order_created"})," dapat dipublikasikan, yang dapat dilanggani oleh layanan lain tanpa membuat ketergantungan langsung."]}),"

",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Basis Data (PostgreSQL)"}),": Basis data PostgreSQL pusat menyimpan data inti untuk aplikasi. Setiap modul layanan bertanggung jawab atas skemanya sendiri di dalam basis data ini."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Caching (Redis)"}),": Redis digunakan sebagai cache dalam memori untuk menyimpan data yang sering diakses, mengurangi beban basis data dan meningkatkan waktu respons."]}),"

title: Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway
excerpt: A Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway built with Go, gRPC, PostgreSQL, and Kafka with full observability stack.
body:
const{Fragment:a,jsx:n,jsxs:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return e(a,{children:[n(r.h1,{id:"-distributed-modular-monolith-payment-gateway",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-distributed-modular-monolith-payment-gateway",children:"üí≥ Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway"})}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Proyek ini adalah ",n(r.strong,{children:"Implementasi Distribute Modular Monolith Payment Gateway"})," dari ",n(r.strong,{children:"Sistem Gerbang Pembayaran"}),". Arsitektur ini dirancang untuk menyediakan ",n(r.strong,{children:"backend yang aman, dapat diskalakan, dan modular"})," untuk menangani transaksi keuangan, pembayaran merchant, operasi kartu, dan alur penyelesaian."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Tidak seperti monolit tradisional, sistem ini disusun menjadi ",n(r.strong,{children:"modul (layanan) yang terdefinisi dengan baik"})," seperti ",n(r.strong,{children:"Auth, Pengguna, Peran, Kartu, Saldo, Transaksi, Merchant, Transfer, Isi Ulang, Tarik Tunai"}),", dll. Setiap modul berkomunikasi secara internal melalui ",n(r.strong,{children:"gRPC"})," dan secara eksternal melalui ",n(r.strong,{children:"API Gateway (NGINX)"}),". Peristiwa dipublikasikan melalui ",n(r.strong,{children:"Kafka"})," untuk alur kerja asinkron yang digerakkan oleh peristiwa (misalnya, penyelesaian, notifikasi email, pembaruan saldo)."]}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Di lapisan infrastruktur, sistem terintegrasi dengan:"}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"PostgreSQL"})," sebagai basis data relasional inti."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Redis"})," untuk caching dan manajemen sesi waktu nyata."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Kafka"})," (dengan Zookeeper) sebagai bus acara untuk pemrosesan asinkron."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Layanan Email"})," untuk mengirim konfirmasi, penyelesaian, dan notifikasi transaksional."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Tumpukan Observabilitas"})," (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Jaeger, OpenTelemetry) untuk pemantauan, pencatatan, dan pelacakan di seluruh ekosistem."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Penerapan dapat dijalankan di:"}),"

",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Docker Compose"})," untuk pengembangan dan pengujian lokal yang lengkap."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Kubernetes"})," untuk lingkungan tingkat produksi dengan penskalaan otomatis dan ketahanan."]}),"
"]}),"

",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["

",n(r.li,{children:"Otentikasi pengguna yang aman dengan JWT."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Kontrol akses berbasis peran (admin, merchant, pelanggan, sistem)."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Izin disimpan di Redis untuk pencarian cepat."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:n(r.strong,{children:"üí≥ Manajemen Kartu & Saldo"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Pendaftaran kartu dan manajemen siklus hidup."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Pembaruan saldo otomatis yang dipicu oleh peristiwa kartu."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Layanan saldo memastikan status akun yang konsisten."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"

",n(r.li,{children:"Peristiwa transaksi dipublikasikan ke Kafka untuk layanan hilir."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Konfirmasi transaksi waktu nyata dikirim melalui email."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"

"]}),"

",n(r.h3,{id:"1-docker-compose-pengembangan-lokal",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#1-docker-compose-pengembangan-lokal",children:n(r.strong,{children:"1. Docker Compose (Pengembangan Lokal)"})})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["Mengatur ",n(r.strong,{children:"API Gateway, Layanan Inti, Pesan (Kafka + Zookeeper), Basis Data (PostgreSQL), Redis, Layanan Email, dan tumpukan Observabilitas"}),"."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["Ideal untuk ",n(r.strong,{children:"pengujian integrasi"})," dan menjalankan sistem gerbang pembayaran penuh secara lokal."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Pengembang dapat memvalidasi alur transaksi ujung ke ujung (misalnya, kartu ‚Üí saldo ‚Üí transaksi ‚Üí email)."}),"
"]}),"

",e(r.li,{children:["Horizontal Pod Autoscalers (HPA) menskalakan layanan penting seperti ",n(r.strong,{children:"Transaksi"}),", ",n(r.strong,{children:"Saldo"}),", atau ",n(r.strong,{children:"Merchant"})," di bawah beban."]}),"

",e(r.li,{children:["Alur yang digerakkan oleh peristiwa tetap terpisah, memastikan ",n(r.strong,{children:"throughput tinggi dan toleransi kesalahan"})," dalam operasi keuangan."]}),"
"]}),"

title: Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway Rust
excerpt: A Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway Platform built with Rust, gRPC, PostgreSQL
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const l={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",table:"table",tbody:"tbody",td:"td",th:"th",thead:"thead",tr:"tr",ul:"ul",...i.components};return r(e,{children:[n(l.h1,{id:"distributed-modular-monolith-payment-gateway-in-rust",children:n(l.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#distributed-modular-monolith-payment-gateway-in-rust",children:"Distributed Modular Monolith Payment Gateway in Rust"})}),"
",n(l.p,{children:"A production-ready payment gateway platform implementing a modular monolith architecture, built with Rust, gRPC, PostgreSQL, and React."}),"
",n(l.p,{children:n(l.img,{src:"/portofolio/distributed-modular-monolith-paymentgateway-rust_1.png",alt:"Payment Gateway Dashboard"})}),"

",n(l.p,{children:"This project demonstrates a comprehensive payment gateway system designed to simulate digital financial transactions. Built with a modular monolith architecture, the system separates business domains (users, balances, transactions) into independent modules within a single codebase. Inter-module communication is efficiently handled through gRPC."}),"
",n(l.p,{children:"The primary goal is to provide a real-world example of modern architecture implementation in the Rust ecosystem, complete with a backend, frontend dashboard, and desktop application version."}),"

",r(l.ul,{children:["
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"User Management & JWT Authentication"}),": Secure registration, login, and session management"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)"}),": Feature access restriction based on user roles"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Digital Wallet Management"}),": Balance top-up and utilization for transactions"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Financial Transactions"}),":","
",r(l.ul,{children:["
",n(l.li,{children:"Top-up from external sources"}),"
",n(l.li,{children:"Peer-to-peer transfers"}),"
",n(l.li,{children:"Withdrawal to external accounts"}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Payment Card Management"}),": Users can link and manage payment cards"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Administrative Dashboard"}),": Interface for monitoring and managing system activities"]}),"
",r(l.li,{children:[n(l.strong,{children:"Inter-Service Communication"}),": Efficient, type-safe communication via gRPC"]}),"
"]}),"

",n(l.p,{children:"The system is designed as a modular monolith. Although contained within a single repository, it consists of several services (crates) that communicate with each other through gRPC. This design provides clear separation of concerns while simplifying deployment and development compared to a full microservices architecture."}),"
",r(l.p,{children:["The ",n(l.code,{children:"APIGateway"})," serves as the single entry point for all external HTTP requests. It handles request authentication and forwards them to the appropriate internal services via gRPC. All services share a single PostgreSQL database."]}),"

title: Distributed Modular Monolith Point Of Sale
excerpt: A Distributed Modular Monolith Point Of Sale built with Go, gRPC, PostgreSQL, and Kafka with full observability stack.

",e(r.p,{children:["Proyek ini adalah ",a(r.strong,{children:"Implementasi Distributed Modular Monolith Point Of Sale"})," dari ",a(r.strong,{children:"Sistem Point of Sale (POS)"}),". Prinsip desain intinya adalah mempertahankan ",a(r.strong,{children:"pemisahan modular"})," (otentikasi, pengguna, merchant, produk, transaksi, dll.) sambil tetap di-deploy sebagai ",a(r.strong,{children:"monolit tunggal"})," untuk kesederhanaan operasional."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Tidak seperti monolit tradisional, implementasi ini mengadopsi ",a(r.strong,{children:"struktur modular dengan batasan domain yang jelas"})," dan memanfaatkan ",a(r.strong,{children:"gRPC"})," untuk komunikasi internal antar-layanan. Hal ini memungkinkan arsitektur untuk diskalakan seperti layanan mikro tetapi tanpa kompleksitas mengelola sistem yang sepenuhnya terdistribusi di awal. Seiring waktu, setiap modul dapat diekstraksi menjadi layanan mikro independennya sendiri jika diperlukan."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Sistem ini dirancang untuk menangani ",a(r.strong,{children:"operasi POS dalam skala besar"}),", termasuk otentikasi, akses berbasis peran, manajemen merchant, pelacakan inventaris, operasi kasir, pemrosesan pesanan, dan penanganan pembayaran."]}),"

",a(r.p,{children:a(r.a,{href:"https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNV9tu4zYQ_RVBiy1awE4iWb5p2wCpvUjT3U28SQoUbYqCEke2EFkyKCqXJvn3ktSNIinHfrHIc2Y4PDPSkC92mGGwfTtKssdwgwi1bpd3qcV-Hz9avxh_DfylCICkQCG3FkmRUyAHWeZFsCZot7G-zPK_72yDF_ufu7TkVu7OVhfWOaLwiJ7b-cvzi8s_mQMJ_Dkgx6diXvexurqxltkWxal1A-QhDiFv8QWzX2fkuUKY13qmJguHNf06S6Cl8pGRtiIZLkLaMqsJI_mKYCAXFLYtXUxZfM5osUD5JgYixywmjOSzgm5aJh91aB2pFhkBg0hN4jj-b43zdTt8eVX--waEVVYqyVDPGAPlvz9yeVt81EsVGqmS9ZFvCUpzFNI4S1sTadJoCClW9LlII4KsobVEFAUoB4NENcT8NyxNmJhxu7E0U71bWGU5XRO4-f6V11MzeNe5NRyeSsaHbG-Bwg1YP1jfCyikPV4DjnnWxb9SPO27jaJ7dENReM9fcT6wxEiLU2A1R0P_yrJ7gB0Qxmie-1lik6WnPfu7ClhBPaAgTmL6bIi9g_Oaksc922Bv9paiOClfcvGocS7Zp_bz0y4jVOyHD616bNZFYpca9tK_ZvcxY_E_Y2xAN1DkVXTlQH-VKCSLLEkgpBlfko-tZkKjnxMUoZTnrnrSGL8jWIvgywelVmTZROJE8L2KlQXcRt-v1l5mO9-zpkLoiLJHL0GuhXiHVsnRLVGlVt9vv7_d3q6OpebHUpWmIL5j-UE-RKMUASntT4WldqdC3RanompP09eVO5iKSi1LhZSeosJS_zCG1IPp7UHKxucHSGlu_YhZzIB_KuclZazh0fD0VZwFVkC2cZ7zz7iwetW3Ik2UhqIjN42xMjNu02wqmmRlpm1f8VOaSV2Y0gS20K5rEkJttqWTst-uUIyPryEqUgx4n5NGTdE89IpVCrGsPtFndLm7ULcQVVQtRBXvFqKKdhTvQpqyXVjKhDGkHkyXTma0B3DREzQRS22VVlhy-6q8yzCWXQt3yqsJZvnrYelUzyBqTlXckFiVYsyuSjKkWKWoeVZxU7JVjppxY6z7CD25l2mN5t-AkjjMxbEgLwj0qM5f1ONtyX3VOqP2DeunqrnYz9bTsp-vZmg_W_sM9lONn79-eieFB2zxQK4pse9kpnyR95Oq97KfdOh5YpGgPLeWEMVpfPghIuRWzMjCEKEioVYUJ4n_wQEHXBjklLCjuf9hNg-8CA3CLMmI_yHEeBJ5FTh8jDHd-M7u6ZPiMeTXytLdyBm5nte4CwM0iaa1u2gMJzgcRFlKh48QrzfUD7IEq-5ica0p_blzd-y2_iIUjGatPwyTGVLNsyCv94ZcOBk3xmgCI-TUxngezefa2uw4EDbKjNAM9SgTRDiIQLVeVwe82oE7HwWNg7kHLh43sZ9EmLkzaNFk84ydTNZpme76ei-Wqk5C1WpyEN0bv0hMB66vuKXGHUjU8KC9Dhoo3fsV07mDahdZruUne2CvSYxtP0JJDgN7y45ciI_tF258Z7Pi37Lbs88eMSLswnaXvjGjHUrZbXFr-5QUzIxkxXrTOCl2mO19GSO2Ykthh3Igi6xIqe07U-HC9l_sJzYazY88dzpxnLE3nU7c-cB-tv3h2Dsaj73JbOLNplPXc9zJ28D-T6zqHLkz54RNjyfOeDJ3He_tf82_J1k",children:a(r.img,{src:"https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNqNV9tu4zYQ_RVBiy1awE4iWb5p2wCpvUjT3U28SQoUbYqCEke2EFkyKCqXJvn3ktSNIinHfrHIc2Y4PDPSkC92mGGwfTtKssdwgwi1bpd3qcV-Hz9avxh_DfylCICkQCG3FkmRUyAHWeZFsCZot7G-zPK_72yDF_ufu7TkVu7OVhfWOaLwi ",a(r.h3,{id:"komponen-inti",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#komponen-inti",children:"Komponen Inti"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"API Gateway"}),": Titik masuk tunggal untuk semua lalu lintas HTTP yang masuk dari klien. Ini bertanggung jawab untuk validasi permintaan, otentikasi, dan merutekan permintaan ke modul layanan hilir yang sesuai melalui gRPC."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Modul Layanan"}),": Logika bisnis inti dienkapsulasi dalam modul-modul yang berbeda (misalnya, ",a(r.code,{children:"User"}),", ",a(r.code,{children:"Product"}),", ",a(r.code,{children:"Cart"}),", ",a(r.code,{children:"Order"}),"). Meskipun dikemas dalam satu biner, mereka berjalan sebagai proses terpisah di lingkungan terdistribusi, memastikan isolasi kesalahan dan skalabilitas independen."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Komunikasi"}),":"]}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Sinkron (gRPC)"}),": Komunikasi berkinerja tinggi dan latensi rendah antara API Gateway dan layanan internal dicapai menggunakan gRPC."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Asinkron (Kafka)"}),": Untuk memisahkan layanan dan menangani alur kerja berbasis peristiwa, platform ini menggunakan Kafka. Misalnya, ketika pesanan dibuat, peristiwa ",a(r.code,{children:"order_created"})," dapat dipublikasikan, yang dapat dilanggani oleh layanan lain tanpa membuat ketergantungan langsung."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.h3,{id:"data-dan-caching",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#data-dan-caching",children:"Data dan Caching"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Database (PostgreSQL)"}),": Database PostgreSQL pusat menyimpan data inti untuk aplikasi. Setiap modul layanan bertanggung jawab atas skemanya sendiri dalam database ini."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Caching (Redis)"}),": Redis digunakan sebagai cache dalam memori untuk menyimpan data yang sering diakses, mengurangi beban database dan meningkatkan waktu respons."]}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.h3,{id:"observability",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#observability",children:"Observability"})}),"
",a(r.p,{children:"Platform ini memiliki tumpukan observability tingkat produksi yang komprehensif yang dibangun di atas tiga pilar observability:"}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Logging (Loki & Promtail)"}),": Semua layanan menghasilkan log terstruktur. Promtail mengumpulkan log-log ini dan meneruskannya ke Loki, sistem agregasi log pusat, yang memungkinkan kueri dan analisis yang kuat."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Metrik (Prometheus & Grafana)"}),": Setiap layanan mengekspos metrik terperinci (misalnya, tingkat permintaan, kesalahan, latensi). Prometheus mengikis dan menyimpan metrik-metrik ini, sementara Grafana menyediakan dasbor yang kaya dan interaktif untuk visualisasi dan pemantauan."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.strong,{children:"Tracing (Jaeger & OpenTelemetry)"}),": Untuk memahami alur permintaan di berbagai layanan, sistem ini diinstrumentasi dengan OpenTelemetry untuk pelacakan terdistribusi. Jejak dikirim ke Jaeger, memungkinkan pengembang untuk memvisualisasikan grafik panggilan, mengidentifikasi hambatan kinerja, dan men-debug masalah di lingkungan terdistribusi."]}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.h2,{id:"makefile",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#makefile",children:"Makefile"})}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Proyek ini dilengkapi dengan ",a(r.code,{children:"Makefile"})," yang berisi berbagai perintah untuk memfasilitasi pengembangan. Berikut adalah beberapa perintah yang tersedia:"]}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make migrate"}),": Menjalankan migrasi database"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make migrate-down"}),": Mengembalikan migrasi database"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make generate-proto"}),": Menghasilkan kode Go dari file ",a(r.code,{children:".proto"})]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make generate-sql"}),": Menghasilkan kode Go dari file SQL"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make generate-swagger"}),": Menghasilkan dokumentasi Swagger"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make seeder"}),": Mengisi database dengan data awal"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make build-image"}),": Membangun image Docker untuk semua layanan"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make image-load"}),": Memuat image Docker ke Minikube"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make image-delete"}),": Menghapus image Docker dari Minikube"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make ps"}),": Menampilkan status kontainer Docker"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make up"}),": Menjalankan semua layanan dengan Docker Compose"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make down"}),": Menghentikan semua layanan yang berjalan dengan Docker Compose"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make build-up"}),": Membangun image dan menjalankan semua layanan dengan Docker Compose"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make kube-start"}),": Memulai Minikube"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make kube-up"}),": Menjalankan semua layanan di Kubernetes"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make kube-down"}),": Menghentikan semua layanan di Kubernetes"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make kube-status"}),": Menampilkan status pod, layanan, PVC, dan pekerjaan di Kubernetes"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make kube-tunnel"}),": Membuat terowongan ke Minikube"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:[a(r.code,{children:"make test-auth"}),": Menjalankan tes pada layanan ",a(r.code,{children:"auth"})]}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.h2,{id:"-source-code--repository",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-source-code--repository",children:"üîó Source Code & Repository"})}),"
",a(r.p,{children:a(r.a,{href:"https://github.com/MamangRust/monolith-pointofsale-grpc",children:"üìå View on GitHub"})})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:e}=n.components||{};return e?a(e,{...n,children:a(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: Distributed Modular Monolith ‚Äì Simple E-commerce
excerpt: A Distributed Modular Monolith ‚Äì Simple E-commerce with Rust, gRPC, PostgreSQL, and with full observability stack.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:a}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",table:"table",tbody:"tbody",td:"td",th:"th",thead:"thead",tr:"tr",ul:"ul",...i.components};return a(e,{children:[n(r.h2,{id:"distributed-modular-monolith--simple-e-commerce",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#distributed-modular-monolith--simple-e-commerce",children:"Distributed Modular Monolith ‚Äì Simple E-commerce"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Distributed Modular Monolith Simple E-commerce adalah sebuah backend e-commerce modern yang dibangun dengan Rust.
Proyek ini mencoba menggabungkan kesederhanaan monolith dengan fleksibilitas microservices menggunakan pendekatan modular monolith."}),"
",a(r.p,{children:["Artinya, semua layanan dikelola dalam satu ",n(r.strong,{children:"monorepo"}),", tapi dipisahkan dalam bentuk modul/layanan independen (",n(r.code,{children:"auth"}),", ",n(r.code,{children:"user"}),", ",n(r.code,{children:"role"}),", ",n(r.code,{children:"product"}),", ",n(r.code,{children:"order"}),", ",n(r.code,{children:"email"}),") yang berkomunikasi lewat gRPC. Dari luar, sistem ini tetap terlihat sebagai satu kesatuan karena ada API Gateway (Axum) yang menyajikan REST API untuk klien."]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"-arsitektur-inti",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-arsitektur-inti",children:"‚ö° Arsitektur Inti"})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Monorepo Modular ‚Üí semua service dalam satu repo, tapi tetap punya batasan domain yang jelas."}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"API Gateway ‚Üí menyediakan REST API untuk frontend/mobile, sekaligus load balancer untuk service internal."}),"
"]}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Service-to-Service ‚Üí komunikasi antar service menggunakan gRPC (Tonic) untuk kecepatan & efisiensi."}),"
",a(r.li,{children:["Event Streaming ‚Üí event penting (misalnya order berhasil) dikirim ke ",n(r.strong,{children:"Kafka"})," lalu diproses oleh service lain (contoh: ",n(r.code,{children:"email worker"}),")."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Observability Lengkap` ‚Üí tracing, metrics, dan logging sudah siap out-of-the-box dengan OpenTelemetry."}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"-fitur-utama",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-fitur-utama",children:"üîë Fitur Utama"})}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"1-manajemen-pengguna--otentikasi",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#1-manajemen-pengguna--otentikasi",children:["1. ",n(r.strong,{children:"Manajemen Pengguna & Otentikasi"})]})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Registrasi & login dengan JWT Authentication (access + refresh token)."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Verifikasi email & reset password menggunakan token."}),"
",a(r.li,{children:["Role-based access control (RBAC) dengan mapping ",n(r.code,{children:"user ‚Üî role"}),"."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Redis digunakan untuk caching session/token agar lebih cepat."}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"2-produk--order",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#2-produk--order",children:["2. ",n(r.strong,{children:"Produk & Order"})]})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"CRUD produk (nama, harga, stok, dsb)."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Order processing sederhana: pengguna dapat membuat pesanan, sistem otomatis menghitung total harga."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Stok produk otomatis berkurang ketika ada transaksi order."}),"
",a(r.li,{children:["Order event dipublish ke ",n(r.strong,{children:"Kafka"}),", lalu dikonsumsi oleh ",n(r.code,{children:"email worker"})," untuk mengirimkan notifikasi."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"3-observability--monitoring",children:a(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#3-observability--monitoring",children:["3. ",n(r.strong,{children:"Observability & Monitoring"})]})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Tracing ‚Üí setiap request antar service bisa dilacak dengan Jaeger."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Metrics ‚Üí performa aplikasi (latensi, throughput, error rate) diekspor ke **Prometheus."}),"
",a(r.li,{children:["Logging ‚Üí log terstruktur dikirim ke ",n(r.strong,{children:"Loki"})," dan divisualisasikan lewat Grafana."]}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"OpenTelemetry Collector digunakan sebagai penghubung utama observability stack."}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"4-infra--deployment",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#4-infra--deployment",children:"4. Infra & Deployment"})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Database: PostgreSQL (SQLx) untuk data utama."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Caching: Redis untuk session/token."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Message Broker: Kafka untuk event-driven flow."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Containerization: Docker & Docker Compose siap pakai."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Makefile: untuk mempermudah perintah build, run, up/down service."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"sqlx-cli: untuk migrasi database otomatis."}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"-kelebihan-proyek-ini",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-kelebihan-proyek-ini",children:"üéØ Kelebihan Proyek Ini"})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Scalable ‚Üí bisa dijalankan sebagai monolith (mudah) atau dipisah jadi microservices (besar skala)."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Production-ready ‚Üí ada autentikasi, logging, monitoring, dan observability lengkap."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Developer-friendly ‚Üí bisa jalan pakai Docker Compose tanpa setup ribet."}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Belajar lengkap ‚Üí cocok buat developer yang mau belajar Rust backend dengan ekosistem modern (REST, gRPC, Kafka, OpenTelemetry)."}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"-panduan-memulai",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-panduan-memulai",children:"üöÄ Panduan Memulai"})}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"prasyarat",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#prasyarat",children:"Prasyarat"})}),"
",a(r.ul,{children:["
",a(r.li,{children:[n(r.a,{href:"https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install",children:"Rust"})," (untuk pengembangan lokal)"]}),"
",a(r.li,{children:[n(r.a,{href:"https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/",children:"Docker"})," dan ",n(r.a,{href:"https://docs.docker.com/compose/install/",children:"Docker Compose"})]}),"
",a(r.li,{children:[n(r.a,{href:"https://github.com/launchbadge/sqlx/tree/main/sqlx-cli",children:"sqlx-cli"})," (untuk migrasi database lokal): ",n(r.code,{children:"cargo install sqlx-cli"})]}),"

title: Payment Gateway with Echo and gRPC
excerpt: A system that simulates a payment gateway handling transactions like card payments, top-ups, withdrawals, and transfers.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const i={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",table:"table",tbody:"tbody",td:"td",th:"th",thead:"thead",tr:"tr",ul:"ul",...t.components};return r(e,{children:[n(i.h1,{id:"payment-gateway-grpc-project",children:n(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#payment-gateway-grpc-project",children:"Payment Gateway gRPC Project"})}),"
",r(i.p,{children:["This project is a ",n(i.strong,{children:"simple payment system implementation"})," designed to mimic the workflow of a typical digital financial service. The system is built with a modular approach, where each service can operate independently but remains interconnected through a consistent database and API."]}),"
",n(i.h3,{id:"core-features",children:n(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#core-features",children:"Core Features"})}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"The key components that form the core of this project include:"}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üîê User Authentication"}),"
Supports new account registration, login with credentials, and JWT token issuance and validation. The system also includes refresh token management to maintain user session security."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üí≥ Card Management"}),"
Each user can add cards to their account. Card details such as number, card type, expiration date, and CVV are stored securely and can be accessed for transactions."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üè¨ Merchant Management"}),"
Merchants can be created and managed through the system. Each merchant has a unique identity in the form of a UUID merchant number and an API key used to process transactions."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üí∏ Transactions"}),"
Handles the payment process between a user's card and a merchant. Each transaction is recorded with a unique number, payment amount, and information about the receiving merchant."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üîÑ Fund Transfers"}),"
Allows users to transfer balances between cards. The system records the source (from) and destination (to) of the transfer, ensuring sufficient balance before processing the transaction."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üìà Balance Top-Up"}),"
Users can add funds to their cards through a top-up process. Each top-up has a unique identity and automatically updates the respective card's balance."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üèß Withdrawals"}),"
Users can withdraw funds from their cards. Like top-ups, this process is recorded, and the balance is updated according to the withdrawal amount."]}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:["
",r(i.p,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"üí∞ Balance Management"}),"
All cards are linked to a balance entity. The system is responsible for tracking, adding, and subtracting balances consistently after every financial operation (transaction, transfer, top-up, or withdrawal)."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(i.hr,{}),"
",n(i.h2,{id:"-project-features",children:n(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-project-features",children:"üöÄ Project Features"})}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"REST API Client"}),": A RESTful client that interacts with the gRPC server."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"gRPC Server"}),": The main server that handles all business logic."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Database Migration"}),": Uses ",n(i.code,{children:"goose"})," to manage the database schema."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"API Documentation"}),": Automatically generated Swagger documentation."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Docker Support"}),": Docker and Docker Compose configurations for an easy development environment."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"Unit & Integration Tests"}),": Testing to ensure code reliability."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[n(i.strong,{children:"CI/CD"}),": GitHub Actions workflows for automated builds, formatting, and testing."]}),"
"]}),"

title: Point of sale GRPC
excerpt: A Point of sale example using Go, Sqlc, and Docker Compose.
body:
const{Fragment:a,jsx:n,jsxs:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return e(a,{children:[n(r.h1,{id:"-proyek-point-of-sale-pos-grpc",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-proyek-point-of-sale-pos-grpc",children:"üí≥ Proyek Point of Sale (POS) gRPC"})}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Proyek ini merupakan ",n(r.strong,{children:"implementasi backend untuk sistem Point of Sale (POS)"})," yang dirancang dengan arsitektur ",n(r.strong,{children:"monolitik terstruktur"}),". Meskipun monolitik, proyek ini disusun dengan modul-modul yang jelas sehingga setiap domain (misalnya pengguna, merchant, inventaris, dan transaksi) tetap mudah dikelola serta memungkinkan pengembangan lebih lanjut tanpa kehilangan keteraturan."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Tujuan utama dari proyek ini adalah untuk menghadirkan ",n(r.strong,{children:"fondasi kuat, aman, dan skalabel"})," bagi aplikasi kasir modern yang digunakan oleh berbagai jenis bisnis ritel. Dengan desain yang terstruktur, sistem mampu menangani kebutuhan kasir sehari-hari mulai dari pengelolaan pengguna, inventaris, hingga pencatatan transaksi penjualan, sambil tetap mudah di-deploy di berbagai lingkungan."]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:["Komunikasi antara klien dengan server dilakukan melalui ",n(r.strong,{children:"REST API"}),", sementara komunikasi internal antara API Gateway dan layanan utama menggunakan ",n(r.strong,{children:"gRPC"})," dengan ",n(r.strong,{children:"Protobuf"}),". Hal ini memastikan sistem memiliki ",n(r.strong,{children:"latensi rendah dan throughput tinggi"}),", sehingga tetap responsif meskipun menangani transaksi dalam jumlah besar. Data transaksi dan manajemen entitas disimpan dengan aman di dalam ",n(r.strong,{children:"PostgreSQL"}),", yang dikenal stabil dan handal untuk kebutuhan finansial serta operasional."]}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"lingkup-dan-fungsi-utama",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#lingkup-dan-fungsi-utama",children:"Lingkup dan Fungsi Utama"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üîê Manajemen Pengguna & Peran"}),"
Sistem mendukung otentikasi dan otorisasi dengan level akses berbeda (admin, pemilik merchant, kasir). Hal ini memastikan hanya pihak berwenang yang dapat melakukan aksi tertentu sesuai tanggung jawabnya."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üè¨ Manajemen Merchant"}),"
Pemilik bisnis dapat mendaftarkan toko/merchant, mengatur informasi penting seperti nama toko, API key, hingga struktur operasional yang mereka miliki."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üë®‚Äçüíº Manajemen Kasir"}),"
Merchant dapat menambahkan akun kasir, memberikan akses sesuai kebutuhan, serta memantau aktivitas kasir mereka secara langsung."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üì¶ Manajemen Inventaris"}),"
Mendukung CRUD penuh terhadap produk dan kategori, mencakup detail stok, harga, deskripsi, hingga kategori produk. Dengan sistem ini, stok selalu up-to-date dan bisa dikontrol secara efisien."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üí≥ Proses Transaksi"}),"
Sistem menyediakan alur lengkap untuk membuat pesanan, menambahkan item ke keranjang, menghitung total pembayaran, hingga mencatat transaksi secara permanen di database."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"‚ö° Komunikasi gRPC Internal"}),"
API Gateway berkomunikasi dengan server utama melalui gRPC, yang memberikan performa tinggi serta mempermudah scaling di masa depan jika sistem ingin dipecah menjadi microservices."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üìñ Dokumentasi API Otomatis"}),"
REST API secara otomatis terdokumentasi dengan Swagger (",n(r.strong,{children:"Swago"}),"), sehingga memudahkan developer maupun tim integrasi untuk memahami dan menguji endpoint yang tersedia."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["
",e(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"üê≥ Kontainerisasi dengan Docker"}),"
Sistem siap dijalankan pada lingkungan terisolasi dengan Docker & Docker Compose, membuat proses setup menjadi cepat, konsisten, dan mudah di-deploy di berbagai platform."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"-tech-teknologi",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#-tech-teknologi",children:"üß∞ Tech Teknologi"})}),"
",e(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:["üêπ ",n(r.strong,{children:"Go (Golang)"})," ‚Äî Bahasa implementasi."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üåê ",n(r.strong,{children:"Echo"})," ‚Äî Kerangka kerja web minimalis untuk membangun REST API."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["ü™µ ",n(r.strong,{children:"Zap Logger"})," ‚Äî Pencatatan terstruktur untuk aplikasi berkinerja tinggi."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üì¶ ",n(r.strong,{children:"SQLC"})," ‚Äî Menghasilkan kode Go yang aman dari tipe dari kueri SQL."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üöÄ ",n(r.strong,{children:"gRPC"})," ‚Äî RPC berkinerja tinggi untuk komunikasi layanan internal."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üß≥ ",n(r.strong,{children:"Goose"})," ‚Äî Alat migrasi untuk mengelola perubahan skema database."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üê≥ ",n(r.strong,{children:"Docker"})," ‚Äî Platform kontainerisasi untuk lingkungan pengembangan yang konsisten."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üìÑ ",n(r.strong,{children:"Swago"})," ‚Äî Menghasilkan dokumentasi Swagger 2.0 untuk rute Echo."]}),"
",e(r.li,{children:["üîó ",n(r.strong,{children:"Docker Compose"})," ‚Äî Mengelola aplikasi Docker multi-kontainer."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.hr,{}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"arsitektur",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#arsitektur",children:"Arsitektur"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Aplikasi ini dirancang dengan arsitektur berorientasi layanan monolith (monolith).
